title: Global papaya production 2000 to 2017
summary: In general Million metric tons has rose over the Year.

Million metric tons is rapidly increasing from 2005 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2011, roughly increasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, and finally roughly decreasing from 2014 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2005 and 2006.
Maximum Million metric tons, about 12.67 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Million metric tons, of value 8.03 was reported at Year 2005
